alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Woods (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:00AM CDT until June 21 at 8:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Woods County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northern Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 845 AM CDT. * At 800 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Hazelton to 4 miles northwest of Aetna, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alva, Burlington, Amorita, Byron, Driftwood, and Capron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
